plot: A bride recalls, first in her delirium, then in her memories, the moment that caused her deep sorrow: when her husband died on their wedding day.
title: Il velo
plot_es: A bride recalls, first in her delirium, then in her memories, the moment that caused her deep sorrow: when her husband died on their wedding day.
plot_en: A bride recalls, first in her delirium, then in her memories, the moment that caused her deep sorrow: when her husband died on their wedding day.
